game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of King Arthur
game.description: King Arthur's treasure was stolen from his castle. Find the thief and recover the treasure.

task.objective: Speak with the local informant for clues about the thief's hideout
task.description: The informant lives in the tavern near the castle. He might have information on the thief and the stolen treasure.

task.objective: Search for clues in the thief's hideout
task.description: The informant will provide you with the location of the thief's hideout. Search it thoroughly to find any leads on the stolen treasure.

task.objective: Interrogate the thief and recover the stolen treasure
task.description: The hideout leads you to the thief's lair. Question him about the treasure's location and retrieve it.
